PerformanceMeasure.summary: PerformanceMeasure is an abstract interface for objects with an of "measure". Entries of this type are created by calling to add a named (the measure) between two marks to the browser's performance timeline.

PerformanceMeasureDetail.summary: The read-only detail property returns arbitrary metadata that was included in the mark upon construction (when using .
PerformanceMeasureDetail.value: Returns the value it was set to (from markOptions of ).
